lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The rating agency also downgraded Mellon Financial Corp <MEL> and Security Pacific Corp <SPC>, but said this reflected higher non-performing assets and weaker operating results rather than the international debt problem.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: In its action, Standard and Poor's cited the exposure to major Latin American debtor countries of Chase Manhattan Corp <CMB>, Chemical New York Corp <CHL>, Irving Bank Corp <V> and Manufacturers Hanover Corp <MHC>.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: S. banks came under light selling pressure in secondary trading on the heels of Standard and Poor's Corp's downgrade of six money center banks late yesterday, analysts and traders said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The rating agency also downgraded Mellon Financial Corp and Security Pacific Corp , but said this reflected higher non-performing assets and weaker operating results rather than the international debt problem.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: In its action, Standard and Poor's cited the exposure to major Latin American debtor countries of Chase Manhattan Corp , Chemical New York Corp , Irving Bank Corp and Manufacturers Hanover Corp .
